title: Manage Subscription
description: [Subscribe to Cloud NGFW for AWS Service](https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/cloud-ngfw/aws/cloud-ngfw-on-aws/getting-started-with-cloud-ngfw-for-aws/subscribe-to-the-cloud-ngfw-service.html) to create your first user; a Tenant Administrator. A Tenant Administrator is the highest user level in the Cloud NGFW service. The Tenant Administrator has the ability to add AWS accounts to the Cloud NGFW service and also onboard additional users.
